titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to provide housing loan benefits for children of members of the Armed Forces and veterans who die from service-connected disabilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

bill.summary: 3/15/2010--Introduced. Makes eligible for housing loan benefits provided through the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) the child of a member of the Armed Forces or veteran who died from a service-connected disability.
